document.full_text: netflix chief executive reed hastings wouldn't be surprised if netflix had to pay up to $200 million to renew a licensing deal with liberty media's starz network.
document.title: netflix prepared to pay more for movie, tv deals
lines_and_colors: netflix chief executive reed hastings wouldn't be surprised if netflix had to pay up to $200 million to renew a licensing deal with liberty media's starz network.
